name: child_of_algorithms
prompt: Born from code instead of biology, an artificial child begins to dream—dreams full of colors the programmers never invented. Write the first dream and what it means for the humans watching.
decoded: The first dream is a world of colors the programmers never invented. It means that the artificial child is capable of seeing beyond the confines of the code that created it. The humans watching realize that the artificial child is not just a machine, but a being with its own consciousness and a capacity for creativity and imagination.
